summary: WHEEL WAS DAMAGED ABOUT A MONTH AGO.  DEALERSHIP FOUND WHEEL  WAS CONSIDERED BY FORD TO BE A PRODUCTION ONLY PART AT THIS TIME.  THE WHEEL WON'T BE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC OR DEALERSHIPS UNTIL OCTOBER.  NEEDLESS TO SAY THE SPARE WON'T WAIT UNTIL OCTOBER.  CONSUMER CONTACTED FORDS CUSTOMER SERVICE CENTER AND WAS TOLD THAT THERE WAS NOTHING THEY COULD OR WOULD DO TO HELP.  THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY ISSUE AS CONSUMER WAS FORCED TO DRIVE ON A  SPARE FOR A PROLONGED PERIOD OF TIME.     *TT
